title: Naan bread
ingredients: ['150ml hand-hot milk', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons dried active yeast', '450g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, plus a little extra', '150ml natural yoghurt, lightly beaten', '1 large egg, lightly beaten']
